availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Edwards Garman in 1844. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Wagon maker in Warren County in 1870.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 118. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 92. “Warren County, Kentucky Marriage Records (MSS 230),” MSS Finding Aids, 2008, http://digitalcommons.wku.edu/dlscmssfinaid/584, p. 141. _Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Lucas, p. 2. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Arkansas, Franklin County, Ivy, p. 15. Find A Grave, "James M. Garman (March 30, 1826-August 13, 1886), Memorial #18573256, http://findagrave.com/memorial/18573256 (accessed on February 12, 2018).
